ZINC Database

biology chemical biology life sciences molecular docking pharmaceutical protein

Description

3D models for molecular docking screens.

Update Frequency

Monthly

Resources on AWS

  • Description
    3D molecular docking structure files in db2.gz, sdf and mol2 formats.
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::zinc3d
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://zinc3d/ --no-sign-request
